name: A Stroll Of the Dice
description:
A short puzzle game where you play a dice on a little walk. Play through 11 levels of puzzling.

Reach the X to beat each level. Light grey rocks will break permanently, dark grey regenerate after you get past them.

Control mappings are shown onscreen (keyboard only). The dice in a cross above the mappings show the current faces of the die.

I haven't programmed an HTML game in a while, so if you're getting performance issues or compatibility issues, please let me know in the comments!

If you want a score to beat, my current best is 483 moves.
